prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Guitar, Bass, Organ, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Guitar, Bass, and Organ are the instruments featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Guitar, Bass, and Organ, but Drums are not included.

Style 3: This composition is comprised of Reed, Guitar, Bass, and Organ, with no Drums.
